params.query:
SELECT uid, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT SUBSTR(created_at, 1, 10)) AS active_days
FROM message 
WHERE created_at >= '2025-09-28 00:00:00.000' AND created_at < '2025-10-22 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY uid
ORDER BY active_days DESC
LIMIT 50000
